home.description: A modern Arabic literature magazine celebrating poetry, critical studies, and stories

settings.title: Settings
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
settings.appLanguageDescription: Language applied to the entire application
settings.quickSwitchDescription: Choose two languages for quick switching
settings.accountMigrationDescription: Migrate your account to a new server or download your data
settings.endAllSessionsDescription: This will log you out from all devices linked to your account
settings.deleteAccountDescription: This action cannot be undone. All data will be deleted and cannot be recovered

migration.title: Migrate your data
migration.description: If you wish to migrate or backup your data, you can do so using the options below. This will allow you to keep your data when you switch accounts
migration.downloadDataDescription: This will download your data to your device. You can then upload it to the new server or just keep it for safekeeping
migration.uploadDataDescription: Upload your previously exported data file to restore your bookmarks and progress on this account
migration.selectFile: Select the file you want to upload:

publication.signInToLike: Please sign in to like publications
